casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Almedeo Eugene STEWART No. 98P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Francisco Benzoni, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Stewart, Almedeo Eugene.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 28th of March 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
